actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for two years the higher exemption amounts under the alternative minimum tax for individuals and to adjust the exemption amounts and phaseout thresholds in the alternative minimum tax for inflation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend the increased exemption from the alternative minimum tax for individual taxpayers for two additional years; and (2) adjust for inflation such increased exemption amounts, the exemption amount for corporations, and the phaseout thresholds applicable to individual taxpayers with certain levels of alternative minimum taxable income.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for two years the higher exemption amounts under the alternative minimum tax for individuals and to adjust the exemption amounts and phaseout thresholds in the alternative minimum tax for inflation.
